recipeName: 18 Best Boneless Chicken Breast Recipes Ready in 30 Minutes or Less
17 Easy 30-Minute Pork Dinners for Busy Weeknights
9 Ways to Do Dinner for One in 30 Minutes

ingredientsArray: 1 tablespoon Cantanzaro herbs, (such as Savory Spice Shop® Cantanzaro herbs)
1/2 cup freshly shaved Parmesan cheese, or as needed, for garnish
¾ cup finely shredded Parmesan cheese
1 teaspoon minced fresh parsley, or to taste
2 cups diced cooked chicken breast meat
2 lemons - cut into wedges, for garnish
1 pound beef sirloin, cut into 2-inch strips
1 red bell pepper, cut into matchsticks

recipeName: Spicy Thai Basil Chicken (Pad Krapow Gai)
ingredientsArray: 1 tablespoon soy sauce, or as needed
1 pound skinless, boneless chicken thighs, coarsely chopped
2 tablespoons minced Thai chilies, Serrano, or other hot pepper
1 cup very thinly sliced fresh basil leaves
4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - pounded to ½-inch thickness
1 cup oil for frying, or as needed
1 (10.5 ounce) can fat-free condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 tablespoon garlic powder, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
¼ cup all-purpose flour for coating
4 medium skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - pounded 1/4 inch thick
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 tablespoon lemon juice, or to taste (Optional)
1 teaspoon chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley, or to taste (Optional)
½ teaspoon chopped fresh thyme, or to taste (Optional)
1 ½ cups low sodium, low fat vegetable broth
3 ½ cups canned black beans, drained
1 ½ pounds skinless boneless chicken thighs, cut in 1-inch pieces
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pound catfish fillets, cut in strips
1 teaspoon seafood seasoning, such as Old Bay™
1 quart vegetable oil for deep frying
1 tablespoon butter, cut in small pieces
3 cups chicken broth, or more as needed
2 tablespoons cold butter, cut into 4 equal pieces, divided
⅓ cup chopped flat-leaf parsley, divided
2 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces
1 pinch crushed red pepper flakes, or to taste
⅓ cup oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained and cut into strips
2 (6.5 ounce) cans minced clams, with juice
2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into bite-size pieces
1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
2 pounds large shrimp, peeled and deveined
2 whole rainbow trout, gutted and cleaned, heads and tails still on

recipeName: Crab Legs with Garlic Butter Sauce
ingredientsArray: 1 pound Snow Crab clusters, thawed if necessary
¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
1 tablespoon olive oil, or as desired
6 chicken breasts, cut in half lengthwise (butterflied)
salt and ground black pepper to taste

recipeName: Baked Flounder with Panko and Parmesan

ingredientsArray: 1 clove garlic, minced, or more to taste
2 (1.41 ounce) packages sazon seasoning (such as Goya®)
½ teaspoon Spice Islands® Garlic Powder
½ teaspoon Spice Islands® Onion Powder
½ teaspoon Spice Islands® Fine Grind Sea Salt
¼ teaspoon Spice Islands® Fine Grind Black Pepper
½ cup crushed buttery round crackers
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers
¾ (8 ounce) package processed cheese, cubed
½ (4 ounce) jar sliced mushrooms, drained
salt and ground black pepper to taste
¼ cup Italian-style dry bread crumbs
2 (14.75 ounce) cans salmon, drained and flaked
¾ cup Italian-seasoned panko (Japanese bread crumbs)
2 tablespoons creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®)
2 teaspoons seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®)
1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed, divided
2 (10.5 ounce) cans condensed cream of chicken soup
salt and ground black pepper to taste

recipeName: Savory Sea Scallops and Angel Hair Pasta
ingredientsArray: 2 pounds sea scallops, rinsed and patted dry
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese to taste (Optional)
1 pound medium shrimp, peeled (tails left on) and deveined
salt and ground black pepper to taste
3 tablespoons cold unsalted butter, cut in 1/4-inch slices
1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle beer, or as needed

recipeName: Air Fryer Tilapia with Fresh Lemon Pepper
ingredientsArray: 1 ½ teaspoons coarsely ground black peppercorns
1 sprig parsley, chopped, or more to taste
4 salmon fillets, skin and bones removed

recipeName: Air Fryer Lobster Tails with Lemon-Garlic Butter
ingredientsArray: salt and ground black pepper to taste
½ cup Hellmann's® or Best Foods® Real Mayonnaise
4 (5 ounce) boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
4 teaspoons Italian seasoned dry bread crumbs
1 tablespoon vegetable oil, or to taste
2 tablespoons seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay)
1 pound fresh large shrimp, deveined with shells on
⅓ cup thinly sliced green onions
2 tablespoons Chinese cooking wine, sherry, or apple cider vinegar
⅓ cup instant mashed potato flakes
½ cup butter, or to taste
salt and ground white pepper to taste
